attributes.action: Ban landlords from being predjudice against pet owners (pet clause - tenancy)
attributes.additional_details:
With more people forced to rent due to housing prices so only the wealthy can afford them, then allowing the landlords to dictate if the tenants can get a pet or forcing them to abandon those they already have is completley wrong! 
I've never heard of an animal throwing a party & trashing a property or running up debt at an address so why the discrimination? 
If an animal is allowed to cause damage or left alone too often this is cruelty & should be dealt with as such by the correct authorities!
attributes.background:
Allowing property owners to discriminate against pet owners needs abolishing! 
With animal shelters full and requesting funding and tenants forced to abandon pets (- members of their family) to keep a roof over their heads the solution seems pretty clear!
Ban the pet clause in tenancy agreements.
